name: Breakout Strategy
description: A strategy focused on identifying and trading breakout patterns from consolidation phases. Wait for a tight range formation with declining volume, then enter on the breakout with tight stops.

name: Trend Following
description: Simple trend following strategy using moving averages. Enter long when price is above 20 EMA and short when below. Focus on high-probability setups during trending markets.

name: Mean Reversion
description: Trade against temporary price deviations using RSI and Bollinger Bands. Enter short when price is extended above upper band and long when below lower band. Great for ranging markets.

name: News Trading
description: High-impact news event trading strategy. Analyze fundamentals and trade reaction to economic data releases. Requires quick execution and tight risk management.

name: Range Trading
description: Identifies and trades established price ranges. Buy support, sell resistance. Requires patience and discipline to wait for proper setup confirmation.

name: Momentum Trading
description: Captures strong price movements using momentum indicators. Enter trades in the direction of the momentum with strict exit rules to avoid giving back profits.

name: Support and Resistance
description: Classical S&R trading based on identified levels. Wait for rejection at key levels with volume confirmation. Combine with candlestick patterns for higher probability.

name: Economic Calendar Trading
description: Strategic approach to trading around economic events. Analyze market sentiment and trade the post-event reaction based on fundamental analysis.
